ingredients: 3 tablespoons canola oil, divided 1 (14-ounce) package extra firm tofu, drained, patted dry and cut into 1/2-inch cubes 3 tablespoons cornstarch 2 yellow onions, very thinly sliced 1 tablespoon finely chopped fresh ginger 1 tablespoon garam masala 1 (28-ounce) can diced tomatoes, with their liquid 1/4 cup water or vegetable broth 1 (1-pound) bag frozen green peas, thawed Salt and pepper to taste 1 (1-pound) package frozen cooked jasmine rice, prepared according to package directions
